name: Euro-TC European Treatment Centres for Drug Addiction
goal:
Euro-TC is a network of professional addiction treatment centres covering 12 European countries.
The network provides exchange of knowledge on the level of professionals as well as on the level of clients.

It aims for steady progress in optimizing treatment programs towards the nedd of the clients. Mutual exchange of best practice and sharing of knowledge is provided through meetings and conferences, common therapeutic, creative and sport activities, training and staff exchange.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Mitglied des Civil Society Forums on Drugs der EU Kommission.
